title: Stuck in an Endless Loop
body:
http://imgur.com/a/vG9g7

Hi. I have a problem where I click "ok" and "restart", but nothing seems to change. They keep leading back to each other. I am connected to the internet, but it says that I am not. I hope that someone can help me. Thank you in advance!

replies.body: Let me know if you're still having this problem, as most players have been reporting that the issue has cleared up by now!
